roleset.name: drive or impel with the foot
roleset.note: KICK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'kick' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes carry-11.4-1 hit-18.1 split-23.2 throw-17.1; other framed members include: push; hit, strike; cut, draw, pull, push, roll, slip; fire, hit, pass. Comparison with 'hit' and 'begin'. (from kick.01-v predicate notes)

KICK-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to kick.01-v. VN classes carry-11.4-1-1, hit-18.1-1, split-23.2, throw-17.1-1-1, swat-18.2, body_internal_motion-49, and crane-40.3.2. Framed by Katie. (from kick.01-n)

KICKING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, kick-v.01, kick-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls carry-11.4-1-1, hit-18.1-1, split-23.2, throw-17.1-1-1, swat-18.2, body_internal_motion-49, and crane-40.3.2. (from kicking.01-n)

example.name: not a foot
example.text: But [two big New York banks]-1 seem *trace*-1 to have kicked those chances away, for the moment, with the embarrassing failure of Citicorp and Chase Manhattan Corp. to deliver $7.2 billion in bank financing for a leveraged buy-out of United Airlines parent UAL Corp.
example.arg: with the embarrassing failure of Citicorp and Chase Manhattan Corp. to deliver $7.2 billion in bank financing for a leveraged buy-out of United Airlines parent UAL Corp

example.name: no instrument
example.text: John-1 tried *trace*-1 to kick the football, but Mary pulled it away at the last moment.

example.name: args 0, 1, DIR
example.text: His kicking the glass out of her way still gets me like a sap.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: While program trades swiftly kicked in, a ``circuit breaker'' that halted trading in stock futures in Chicago made some program trading impossible.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary gamely kicked in $5 to John's bail.

example.name: all args
example.text: [The yearlong schedule of festivities]-1 will be kicked *trace*-1 off officially with a combination live and animation half-time special at the Super Bowl in January.
example.arg: with a combination live and animation half-time special
